naslov: PRODAJA - KUĆA DRUGI RED OD MORA - 300m2 - DONJI KARIN (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: PRODAJA - KUĆA DRUGI RED OD MORA - DONJI KARIN Prodajemo kuću ukupne površine 300m2 u Donjem Karinu, kraj Benkovca. Izvrsno odmaralište, blizina većih gradova. Kuća se nalazi svega 50m od plaže, drugi red od mora, poznato i kao Karinsko more. Do nje vodi asfaltirani put kroz borovu šumu i pruža pravi dalmatinski ugođaj. Kuća se sastoji od 2 etaže, prizemlja i visokog prizemlja, svaka ima 81m2 površine. Prizemlje se sastoji od manjeg apartmana s kuhinjom, blagovaonicom, kupaonicom i spavaćom sobom. Pokraj apartmana nalazi se spremište. Također, pripada mu velika terasa s pogledom od 44m2. U visokom prizemlju nalazi se veći stan koji se sastoji od kuhinje i blagovaonice, dnevnog boravka, kupaonice, 3 spavaće sobe i velike terase s pogledom. Kuća raspolaže sa 3 parkirna mjesta. Vlasništvo uredno, 1/1! Bonus nekretnine d.o.o. Osredak 4, Zagreb Zadar FOR SALE - HOUSE SECOND ROW FROM THE SEA - DONJI KARIN We are selling a house with a total area of 300m² in Donji Karin, near Benkovac. An excellent vacation property, with close proximity to larger cities. The house is located just 50m from the beach, in the second row from the sea, known as Karinsko more. It is accessible via an asphalt road through a pine forest, providing an authentic Dalmatian atmosphere. The house consists of two floors: the ground floor and the high ground floor, each with an area of 81m². GROUND FLOOR includes a small apartment with a kitchen, dining area, bathroom, and bedroom.Next to the apartment, there is a storage room.Additionally, the ground floor has a large terrace with a sea view, covering 44m². HIGH GROUND FLOOR features a larger apartment, comprising a kitchen and dining area, living room, bathroom, 3 bedrooms, and a large terrace with a view. The property has 3 parking spaces. Clear ownership (1/1)! Bonus nekretnine d.o.o. Osredak 4, Zagreb Zadar
